name: EU Tour
description:
An oversized unisex fit developed with high quality cotton. A custom made work of art! Inspired by the colours of Overdrive. Limited Edition Item.
For men we recommend taking your standard size, for a true to fit look. Take one size up for an oversized look. For women we recommend taking your standard size for an oversized look. Take one size down for a true to fit look.
Unisex
Relaxed fit
295 GSM jersey
100% Cotton
DTF Print
Custom Embroidered Patches
Made in Portugal

This is a pre-order product, shipping starts approximately 6 weeks after your purchase.
